name: Carrie Geiger
text: Although the hours was between lunch and dinner. This Pizza Hut was very clean, well organized and we'll stocked. The pizza was very delicious and piping hot. The service was fast and friendly. My daughter and I enjoyed our visit very much.

name: Mary Hall
text: Pizza was moist. Great

name: Marie Joiner
text: Visit was one of enjoyment and gratitude for the young man that waited our table was ever so pleasant, respectful, mannered and stayed on top of our needs. Food was very good as well. Our visit was between 4 and 5pm on a Tuesday evening.

name: ander coleman jr
text: They where very rude to me an my family they messed our order up when we tried to tell them they said that's what we ordered my kids wouldn't even eat the pizzas we bought had to go get them something else to eat

text:
Have to wait too long for waitress to come back to the table and see if you want anything.
Same as it was two years ago, service is lousy. …More

name: mark howard
text: Service wishy washy, ordered thick crust got thin crust. Went there 3 times in one week, because I love pizza and they never got my order right. When I go to a larger city I order pizzas then but never from this Swainsboro store never.

name: Emma Jean
text: Slow service, cold food, rude staff.  Literally the only good thing I can say was the tea tasted good.  I don't think I can stomach eating here again.

name: Ryan Powell
text: Under staffed but very polite cordial staff.

name: Kelly Farrow
text: The service was terrible. We had to ask for refills on drinks. Pizza looked and tasted horrible, no cheese on top to hold the toppings. One customer had to send a personal pan back for some reason I'm not aware of and salad bar had an empty …More

name: Amanda Bell
text: Best pizza hut we've visited in a long time. And the waitress was as sweet as could be. Great place!

name: Susan Burke
text: Great personality from the workers. Food was ready ahead of time promised.

name: Abigail Fountain
text: Pizza Hut left my pizza really greasy and it wasn’t even cut. I also ordered stuffed cheese garlic knots and there was no cheese at all. Although, I do have to say the delivery guy was nice I appreciate his attitude very much. Do better Pizza Hut.

name: Anna Saraceni
text: I've been to many Pizza Huts before, but none like this one! They greeted me when I came in the restaurant, friendly atmosphere and very helpful in explaining different specials and which one would be best for what I wanted. I highly recommend to come visit and get your Pizza Hut fix...oh yeah! Their Pizza was/is delicious

Pizzas good. but when you walk in the stand with a stupid look on her face and says "what"
And insist that you get the buffet. Which is cold,picked over, and before you …More

text: Salad bar isn't what it used to be. Or service. Wings are still good. Delivery was ok but now we were told they couldn't. I saw the girl later that day in delivery.

name: Rosemarie Mcneal
text: I orders 4 pizzas and boneless wings and they messed my order up and didn't even give me a credit. I don't go there anymore

name: Kevin Maxwell
text: This has to be the worst pizza hut I have ever been to. The tables felt like they were cleaned with honey, all of our drinks were as flat as pancakes, server must have taken vacation just as we walked in and the phone.... That has to be the loudest phone ever. And it rings constantly, no body answers. Definitely will NOT be back.

name: Mike Jeffers
text: I placed an order at 12:30 in the afternoon on 2-1-19. They charged my card by 1:00. At 2:00 I still hadn’t seen my pizza delivered. I called to verify and they apologized that it was taking so long and told me that they will credit the …More

name: Breana Simmons
text: We sat down 45 minutes ago and still don't have any food. There are at least six people waiting on carry out orders and three other tables who don't have their food yet either. The kids were so hungry they're just eating salad bar but had …More

name: Cara Sanderson
text: From out of town and this pizza hut is nothing like ours, stood at the register for 10 mins while employees were talking and goofing around before someone helped me, because I had asked them too. The garlic buttery blend wasn't on my crust as ordered. Overall not a great experience.

name: Heather Dean
text: The the herself helped me check out n she was extremely rude. I will never go back. The wait staff was nicer than the mgr. How does that even happen.? Rude rude and basically calped me a liar...! A paying customer. Wow. Never again.

name: heather elixere
text: Still waiting for my pizza. I only live three blocks from the store with no light and it's been almost 2 hours. Called twice and they said both times that he has already left the store?! Where the heck is my family's food!

text: Horrible! DON'T EAT HERE! We walked in and no one, I mean no one some to us for 13 minutes. We ordered over the phone 45 minutes prior to arriving and they still did not have it ready. All the phones were ringing, hardly anyone in drive …More

name: Wake Up
text: They have good deals going on in pizza hut. I got two medium size pizza with any toppings for 6.99 each. I made my order online. The pizza was made on time even though they looked like they were busy. only thing they messed up was I had ordered extra jalapenos but i only got one or two jalapenos on each slice, but overall good.

text: Hard and odd colored. Understand why people order from Dominoes.

name: Karl Jacobs
text: I got pizza and wings. The pizza was great but the wings were tough and dried out. Reminded me of my dogs raw hide"not that I tried his raw hide", he wouldn't let me. The last 3 times we got wings they all were like that. So, I will not try them again.I'll go back for pizza but NO wings.
